item.title: Euromonitor examines consumer opportunities for individuals aged 60 and above
item.description: Source: Euromonitor website. Market research firm Euromonitor International has published a new report on the growing market of older consumers. Though businesses have often overlooked this demographic— individuals aged 60 and above— due to perceptions of low spending, limited income, and resistance to marketing, this group is expanding rapidly. In 2014, the global population aged 60 and over reached 912 million, accounting for 12.6% of the total. By 2030, this segment is projected to increase to 1.
